title: Heal The World
lyrics:
[Dm/Dm7 both works!]
 
[Intro] (C)
 
(N/C)There's a (C)place in your (Dm7)heart
And I (Em)know that it is (Dm7)love
And this (C)place could be much
(Dm7)Brighter than to(Em)morrow           (Dm7)
And if (C)you really  (Dm7)try
You'll find (Em)there's no need to  (Dm7)cry
In this (C)place you'll feel
(Dm7)There's no hurt or (Em)sorrow   (Dm7)
 
There are (F) ways to (Em)get there
If you (F)care enough for the (Em)living
Make a (Dm7)little space
Make a (G)better place (N/C)
 
Heal the (C)world
Make it a (Dm7)better place
For (G)you and for me
And the (C)entire human race
(G)There are (Am) people (Em)dying
If you (F)care enough for the (Em)living
Make it a (Dm7)better place
For (G)you and for (C)me
 
If you (C)want to know (Dm7)why
There's (Em)love that cannot (Dm7)lie
Love is (C)strong
It only (Dm7)cares of joyful (Em)giving   (Dm7)
If we (C)try we shall (Dm7)see
In this (Em)bliss we cannot (Dm7)feel
Fear of (C)dread
We stop ex(Dm7)isting and start (Em)living  (Dm7)
 
Then it (F) feels that (Em)always
(F)Love's enough for us (Em)growing
So make a (Dm7)better world
Make a (G)better place
 
Heal the (C)world
Make it a (Dm7)better place
For (G)you and for me
And the (C)entire human race
(G)There are (Am) people (Em)dying
If you (F)care enough for the (Em)living
Make it a (Dm7)better place
For (G)you and for (C)me
 
And the (Bb)dream we were conceived in
Will reveal a (C)joyful face
And the (Bb)world we once believed in
Will shine a(C)gain in grace
Then (Am)why do we keep (Em)strangling life
Wound this (C)earth, crucify its (G)soul
Though it's (Dm7)plain to see
This world is heavenly
(F)Be god's (G)glow
 
We could (C)fly so (Dm7)high
Let our (Em)spirits never (Dm7)die
In my (C)heart I feel (Dm7)you are all my (Em)brothers (Dm7)
Create a (C)world with no (Dm7)fear
Together (Em)weâ€™ll cry happy (Dm7)tears
See the (C)nations turn their (Dm7)swords into (Em)plowshares (Dm7)
 
We could (F) really (Em)get there
If you (F)care enough for the (Em)living
Make a (Dm7)little space
Make a (G)better place (N/C)
 
Heal the (C)world
Make it a (Dm7)better place
For (G)you and for me
And the (C)entire human race
(G)There are (Am) people (Em)dying
If you (F)care enough for the (Em)living
Make it a (Dm7)better place
For (G)you and for (C)me
(G)There are (Am) people (Em)dying
If you (F)care enough for the (Em)living
Make it a (Dm7)better place
For (G)you and for (C)me
 
[outro] (G)you and for (C)me [x3]
[end with tremolo]
